credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of the Estate of David Wolfe Bishop
title: Stage Design:  Interior of a  Sitting Room for the Theater in Marseilles
medium: Pen and gray ink, brush and watercolor over black chalk on paper
description: Design for a stage set.  A richly furnished room in the classical style, with a fireplace and curtained door at the back.  A large divan and three smaller chairs with matching blue upholstery along the walls, coffered ceiling, and tall windows at the left.
name: Drawing
